name: Dragonsbane
overview: Dragonsbane is a maze-based RPG game with basic text interaction, played from a 1st person perspective. The main scenario is a dungeon maze packed with monsters and creatures, containing the traditional RPG elements - potions, weaponry, armours, shields and food. There are 172 rooms and 40 monsters in the dungeon. The player's abilities are characterized by strength, endurance and skill. Food, damage in combat and the items the player is carrying are factors which will interfere directly with the player's status.
